record.dc:title: 51MU12, 15MU12, Muhlenberg, Kentucky. Baker Site. L5 Profile.
record.wpa:narrative: View of the L5 profile (cut along the west side of the heap) from the west. The black area to the left is a place where someone has dug up shells and put back plain black dirt. To the left of this disturbed area is another which has been filled with yellow clay.
